mapper.select: select MEM_ID, MEM_NICKNAME from cs_member where MEM_ID like'%' || #{word}|| '%' or mem_nickname like '%' || #{word} ||'%'
select tag_name from cs_board_tag where tag_name like'%' || #{word}|| '%'
select tag_name from cs_mymap_tag where tag_name like'%' || #{word}|| '%'

select boa_id , boa_latitude , boa_longitude from cs_board where (mem_id=#{0} or mem_id in ( select fol_following from cs_follow where fol_follower=#{0})) and to_number(boa_latitude) between #{3} and #{1} and to_number(boa_longitude) between #{4} and #{2}
